1.Title: Punishment
1.Description: While off-field, the equipper's Energy Regen increases by <color=#2BAD00>0.6</color>/s. Attacks from the equipper increase all units' DMG against a struck target by <color=#2BAD00>10%</color> for 3 seconds. During this period, this effect is further increased by <color=#2BAD00>1.7%</color> every 0.5s, up to a maximum additional increase of <color=#2BAD00>10.2%</color>. Repeated triggers only refresh the duration without refreshing the DMG increase effect. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.
